title: Semigroups
content: A semigroup (` SGrp `, see ~ df-sgrp ) is a set together with an associative binary operation (see Wikipedia, Semigroup, 8-Jan-2020, ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Semigroup ). In other words, a semigroup is an associative magma. The notion of semigroup is a generalization of that of group where the existence of an identity or inverses is not required.

blocks.name: csgrp
blocks.content: Extend class notation with class of all semigroups.

blocks.name: df-sgrp
blocks.content: A _semigroup_ is a set equipped with an everywhere defined internal operation (so, a magma, see ~ df-mgm ), whose operation is associative. Definition in section II.1 of [Bruck] p. 23, or of an "associative magma" in definition 5 of [BourbakiAlg1] p. 4 . (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.) (Revised by AV, 6-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-sgrp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(csgrp, crab(s0, cmgm, wsbc(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wsbc(s2, cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), wral(s3, cv(s1), wral(s4, cv(s1), wral(s5, cv(s1), wceq(co(co(cv(s3), cv(s2), cv(s4)), cv(s2), cv(s5)), co(cv(s3), cv(s2), co(cv(s4), cv(s2), cv(s5)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
}

axiom df-sgrp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ⊢ SGrp = { s0 ∈ Mgm |[(Base ` s0)/ s1][(+ ` s0)/ s2]∀(s3 ∈ s1, ∀(s4 ∈ s1, ∀(s5 ∈ s1,((s3[s2]s4)[s2]s5)=(s3[s2](s4[s2]s5)))))}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s1, s5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s5)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s5)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s5)
  ⊣ d(s4, s5)
}

thm issgrp(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ SGrp ↔(c0 ∈ Mgm ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2)))))))
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(+ ` c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  elrab2(hs2, c0, csgrp, cmgm, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))))), [(Base ` hs2)/ hs1][(+ ` hs2)/ hs0]∀(s0 ∈ hs1, ∀(s1 ∈ hs1, ∀(s2 ∈ hs1,((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2))))))
  sbcied2(hs1, (Base ` hs2), universe, c1, hs2 = c0, [(+ ` hs2)/ hs0]∀(s0 ∈ hs1, ∀(s1 ∈ hs1, ∀(s2 ∈ hs1,((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2))))), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))))))
  fvexd(cbs, hs2, hs2 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs2), c1, (Base ` c0), hs2 = c0)
  fveq2(hs2, c0, cbs)
  sbcied2(hs0, (+ ` hs2), universe, c2, (hs2 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1), ∀(s0 ∈ hs1, ∀(s1 ∈ hs1, ∀(s2 ∈ hs1,((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2))))), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))))))
  fvexd(cplusg, hs2, (hs2 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  syl6eqr((+ ` hs2), c2, (+ ` c0), (hs2 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  adantr(hs2 = c0, hs1 = c1, (+ ` hs2)=(+ ` c0))
  fveq2(hs2, c0, cplusg)
  raleqbidv(s0, hs1, c1, ((hs2 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1)∧ hs0 = c2), ∀(s1 ∈ hs1, ∀(s2 ∈ hs1,((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2)))), ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2)))))
  raleqbidv(s1, hs1, c1, ((hs2 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1)∧ hs0 = c2), ∀(s2 ∈ hs1,((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2))), ∀(s2 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))))
  raleqbidv(s2, hs1, c1, ((hs2 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1)∧ hs0 = c2), ((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2)), ((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2)))
  simplr(hs2 = c0, hs1 = c1, hs0 = c2)
  adantl((hs2 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1), hs0 = c2, (((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2)=(s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2))↔((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))))
  eqeq12d(((s0[hs0]s1)[hs0]s2), (s0[hs0](s1[hs0]s2)), ((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2), (s0[c2](s1[c2]s2)), hs0 = c2)
  oveq123d((s0[hs0]s1), hs0, s2, (s0[c2]s1), c2, s2, hs0 = c2)
  oveq(hs0, c2, s0, s1)
  eqidd(s2, hs0 = c2)

  id(hs0 = c2)

  diff.hs2.c(cmgm)
  diff.hs2.w(∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))))))
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` hs2))
  diff.hs1.w(hs2 = c0)
  diff.hs1.w(∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))))))
  diff.hs0.c((+ ` hs2))
  diff.hs0.w((hs2 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c1, ∀(s2 ∈ c1,((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))))))

  diff.wa.s(s0, hs2 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs2, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, (hs2 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1), hs0 = c2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, hs2 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs2, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, c1)

thm issgrpv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)

  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
